xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.1 Paṭiccavāra » 9.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 9.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Namagga
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Namagga
28.
845Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ…pe…  namaggapaccayā—  ahetukaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… .
<< Najhānaup Nasampayutta >>
